coreQueryPageProvider.name: unmanaged_records
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'Record' AND record:status = 'unmanaged' AND record:min_cutoff_at <= DATE ?

coreQueryPageProvider.name: active_records
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'Record' AND record:status = 'active' AND record:max_retention_at <= DATE ?

genericPageProvider.name: active_records_reminder
genericPageProvider.pattern: SELECT ecm:uuid FROM Document WHERE ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'Record' AND record:status = 'active' AND record:reminder_start_date <= DATE ?
